data.title: XPF to USD: Convert CFP Francs to US Dollars
data.meta_description: Use the XPF to USD currency converter at Exchange-Rates.org for accurate and up-to-date exchange rates. Easily convert CFP Francs to US Dollars with real-time data.
data.text:
Frequently Asked Question about XPF to USD

How much is 1 CFP Franc in US Dollars?

1 CFP Franc = 0.009249 US Dollars as of August 19, 2024 12:45 PM UTC. You can get live exchange rates between CFP Francs and US Dollars using exchange-rates.org, which aggregates real-time forex data from the most authoritative sources.

How much is 100 CFP Francs in US Dollars?

As of August 19, 2024 12:45 PM UTC, 100 CFP Francs is equivalent to 0.9249 US Dollars. The exchange rate at this time is 0.009249 US Dollars per CFP Franc.

What was the highest XPF to USD exchange rate in the last 10 years?

In the last 10 years, the highest rate from CFP Francs to US Dollars was on February 1, 2018 when each CFP Franc was worth 0.01048 US Dollars.

When is the best time to convert XPF to USD?

The XPF and USD can be traded 24x5, starting from the time markets open on Monday mornings in Sydney until they close on Fridays at 5 PM in New York. Exchange rates can fluctuate by the minute while markets are open. However, the period between 3-4 PM GMT is often a good time to convert CFP Francs to US Dollars because currency market liquidity and trading volume tend to be the highest during this time. Additionally, it's advisable to convert CFP Francs to US Dollars early in the week if you need USD urgently. Executing a trade late in the week might result in a delayed settlement until the following week, as forex markets are closed on weekends.

Which is stronger, the CFP Franc or the US Dollar?

The US Dollar is currently stronger than the CFP Franc, as 1 USD is equal to 108.12 XPF. Conversely, 1 XPF is worth 0.009249 USD.

Is the CFP Franc up or down against the US Dollar?

The CFP Franc has decreased -0.01% year-to-date against the US Dollar. Over the past 10 years, the CFP Franc has declined -8.79% against the US Dollar. Consequently, the CFP Franc has lost purchasing power compared to the US Dollar over the last decade.

What's the best XPF to USD exchange rate today?

As of August 19, 2024 12:45 PM UTC, the best XPF to USD exchange rate is 0.009249 USD. This means that for every CFP Franc you exchange, you will receive 0.009249 US Dollars.
